body_html: Agree. The auto tuning of map.num_parallel_calls should consider the factors within different environment. The CPU is scarce resource in distributed environment so that we should carefully tune the num_parallel_calls instead of paying attention only to the map_fn processing time. @fanshiqing is preparing code in recent days. Any comments is appreciated.

body: Agree. The auto tuning of `map.num_parallel_calls` should consider the factors within different environment. The CPU is scarce resource in distributed environment so that we should carefully tune the `num_parallel_calls`  instead of paying attention only to the `map_fn` processing time. @fanshiqing is preparing code in recent days. Any comments is appreciated.
